评论详情: The glasses are well made and nice feeling with a little weight. They came in good shape, they were a gift, they very much being enjoyed. Loved these upon arrival.  They fit fantastically and are comfortable...  BUT... if you are wearing these while driving, GREEN on the Stop Lights are NOT VISABLE.  It appears as though none of the lights are working.  Yellow appears Greenish and Red is still Red.  At the first stop light I encountered appeared to be out of service, but no one was following the road rules for an out of service stop light.  I glanced over the top of the glasses and realized the issue.  Wear at your own risk while driving!  If I could give 2 different star ratings...1⭐ for the safety issue, 5⭐ for the glasses themselves.  I'm sad!
